summary: Implements a high‑level pipeline that combines a BLIP model with a diffusion model and ControlNet to generate images conditioned on textual prompts and optional control signals, handling model initialization and loading from configuration or pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Provide developers and content creators with an easy‑to‑use interface for AI‑driven text‑to‑image generation with fine‑grained control, accelerating creative workflows and product prototyping.
